thread.title: The Daily Heat Index: Pizza Rats Are Taking Over NYC
thread.title_full: The Daily Heat Index: Pizza Rats Are Taking Over NYC | Maxim

author: Maxim Staff
title: The Daily Heat Index: Pizza Rats Are Taking Over NYC
text:
Here's your daily dose of what's heating up the internet:
What's Better Than One Pizza Rat?
What's better than one mega-viral pizza rat that perfectly captures the existential angst that is human existence? Two pizza rats, obviously. The clever folks at Gothamist managed to snag this video, and it is glorious.
I win today, interwebs. #subwayrat #teampizza #pizzarat #pizzaparty
A video posted by Jonathen Liu (@jonathenlewd) on Oct 8, 2015 at 5:11pm PDT
Prepare to Meet 'Justice League Dark'
When there's no reported progress a film since its rumored production back in 2013, you can only fear the worst. This doesn't seem the case for Justice League Dark , as the film landed a huge Hollywood producer in Scott Rudin and talks regarding directors, cast, and script are reportedly underway. No word as to how this DC world will collide for any future comic book collaborations, but the idea of seeing Constantine, Zatanna, and other fan favorites hit the big screen can only mean good things.
Brie Larson Makes Sense of 'The Parachute of Love'
Out promoting her new film, Room , actress Brie Larson took to the 'Tonight Show' to play a quick 'Whisper Game' with Jimmy Fallon. The game has turned into a serious riot with previous guests, and this time is no exception. Spend some time to watch the antics below, and see the big issue with repeating the phrase, 'Got My Mind on My Money and My Money on My Mind.'
